description: Extract valuable insights from meeting transcripts and summaries
author: Fireflies
content: Access and analyze meeting transcripts and insights through Fireflies.ai's meeting intelligence platform.

steps: Add the Fireflies server configuration with HTTP transport

installation.claudeCode: claude mcp add --transport http fireflies https://api.fireflies.ai/mcp

troubleshooting.issue: Too many requests error with code 429
troubleshooting.solution: Free/Pro plans: 50 requests/day limit. Business/Enterprise: 60 requests/minute. Check retryAfter timestamp in error response. Wait specified time before retry or upgrade plan for higher limits.

troubleshooting.issue: Invalid API key or authentication failed error
troubleshooting.solution: Add Authorization header with Bearer YOUR_API_KEY format. Verify API key hasn't expired in Fireflies settings. Check for typos and regenerate key if authentication continues to fail.

troubleshooting.issue: Cannot access meeting transcripts or recordings
troubleshooting.solution: Verify workspace permissions grant access to meetings. Check meeting privacy settings allow API access. Ensure your account has viewer or higher role for target meetings in Fireflies workspace.
Check audio quality of original recording. Verify storage limits haven't been exceeded for your plan tier. Review transcript settings for language and accuracy preferences in Fireflies workspace.
